description: Cesar Rossi has a huge surprise for Scott Riley and they both can't wait. Scott has always wanted a threesome but Cesar has spiced it up a bit. After a short wait Cesar brings in Atlas Grant whom Scott has jacked off too on the web and now he is in his room. They all engage each other and soon enough they are kissing rubbing and letting their hands explore. Their is tons of man on man action going on and nobody is left untouched as they all suck lick and fuck one another until one by one they blast load after load all over Cesar whom is the last to get fucked.
title: Big Bear Surprise
